title: Help me with a few typefaces?
content:
Please help me with naming the following typefaces? I am really new in the world of type, so any help would be greatly appreciated.

author: wanglin

comments.content: 1. ‘With the right …’ is also Soho (as #2, not #3)

6. “John Barrowman...” Looks like DIN.

curious what #1 is too.

6. isn’t DIN.  
folengo IDed 3.  
1. is Soho as Florian said.  
6. and 7. to go.
I am betting 6 and 7 are custom for the magazine. Which magazine is it?

Both Flama?  
6. Flama book or basic  
7. Flama bold
